short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 边写边搜 写得更快更清晰

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save reference from your web browser.
Highlight and take notes on web pages.

Save Reference: the web extension automatically sense content as you browse the web and allows you to save PDF with a single click. You can organize, read, annotate, cite and share. 

Highlight and Annotate: easily capture online contents with colored highlights, which are then automatically curated. It supports texts and images. These highlights can be tagged, searched for, linked to, and used in your writing.

A tool for writers, readers and thinkers.
